website_summaries.verdict: These foam balls come in your choice of sizes, for youth or adult use.
pros: Rebounds back to size when squished
Foam dodgeballs great for the gym, backyard, or camp
made of durable rubber that holds up to extended use by kids and adults
Your choice of 6-inches (youth) or adult (7 inches)
cons: Some find the surface to be slippery for gripping

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of balls.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting these balls to have to be inflated when they arrived, but they are self-inflating by design with a great foam. The first thing one of my buddies did was squish the ball as much as he could and it rebound to full-size after being fully compacted. The outside material seems pretty good, so far the balls have withstood being thrown into brick walls, bleachers, and a gym floor. The set came with an over-sized carry bag which also held my soccer ball and foot ball too.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S

customer_reviews.title: Needed for Robotics Competition
customer_reviews.text: Although not identical to the ones used by FIRST for the challenge these balls did a reasonable job allowing us to test our build at a better price than the official equipment. Will donate to our Phys Ed department when we're on to other challenges.
customer_reviews.author: The Phantom

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sturdy, easy grip, and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Used these today at our kids game time at church. There were definitely some direct face shots with hard throws and no injuries. Just what we were looking for and no tears in the skin. Would definitely purchase these again as they are high quality, sturdy, easy grip, and soft all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: M. McC

customer_reviews.title: Great for Youth Ministry
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this pack multiple times as we build up our youth group dodgeball collection. The 6" are a great size for middle / high schoolers, durable, and easy to throw. Have had them for over a year and they have no signs of destruction yet. I was worried they'd tear. Highly recommend if you work in ministry!
customer_reviews.author: dooleyo

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. We’ve only used these for 1 day so far so I can’t speak for durability, but they seem like they will hold up. Both my six year old and 14 year old enjoy these so win win!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: We used these balls for a 3-grade reward party. Our assistant pricipal thought these were much nicer when she got hit than the old air-filled balls. Less sting. Very easy for smaller hands to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Elementary School Secretary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey but all quality dodgeballs seem to be. Have withstood many church youth dodgeball games with no punctures, scratches Etc. And all walls are still intact in the church!
customer_reviews.author: Sslider

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a Decent Price.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best type of dodgeball, but fine for the price. They don't fly in the air as true as some other brands I use in PE class. They knuckle a bit when thrown at faster speeds and a little bit lighter than another brand that flies more true.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I just ordered a 2nd set for my outdoor pe classes. The first set I've used for over a year & every ball is still in perfect condition. The kids are super excited to have extra balls for dodgeball & other games we play. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: npittman29

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought these for my After School Program kids to play with. They absolutely love dodgeball and these are a great alternative to rubber balls.
customer_reviews.author: Central Karate

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for outside play!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great! I bought them to keep the kids busy outside on nice days. I love that it comes with a bag for easy stroring and putting away! Great colors! I'm hoping they last a long time! They seem high priced, but I'm happy with them and after playing dodgeball with them I think they will hold up. Kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: The Gustafsons

customer_reviews.title: These are solid
customer_reviews.text: I'm a PE teacher so have used these for many games. They are a little bit slippery but very durable. I tested one out in a game called wall ball dodgeball, other brands typically get pretty soft after hitting the brick wall over and over, these still seem good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Jforts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dodgeball for elementary school kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's after school program (they were playing with hard rubber kickballs), and the "injuries" went down by 90%! The kids love the rainbow colors, and I love that the inevitable head shots don't sting as badly as they would with Rubber kickballs (because let's be honest, the accuracy of the K-5 crowd is pretty low).
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, perfect softness!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these balls after using larger, inflatable dodge balls for our homeschool PE class. These balls solved multiple problems for us. The smaller size works great for smaller hands so the younger kids can actually get a grip and throw the balls. The softness of these balls means that nobody gets hurt when hit. The kids all love these dodge balls!! The storage bag works great for transporting the balls back and forth!
customer_reviews.author: H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a set to play dodgeball with my son and grandson, but they're usually pretty expensive. This set arrived and I was extremely pleased. It is a very good set especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price ~ Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These dodgeballs are great for recess. I ordered them twice prior to this and just bought 4 more (24 balls). We needed more balls for the playground. They hold up really well and you don't get hurt when you're hit with one! 😊 Yes, I would recommend them and yes I will buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: You really don't have to look any further. 15 of us (between the age 15-30) played with this dodgeball set for 3 hours in a racketball court. We exhausted ourselves but the dodgeball set remained unharmed. Good times.
customer_reviews.author: PHILIP TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice foam dodgeballs and work as expected. Much more recomended then getting the rubber ones you fill with air. Also nice that these come in a carrying bag. they have lasted many intense games
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are the best dodge balls to play with. Small enough to throw hard, but they don’t hurt when you get hit with them. The bright colors make them easy to see. Hold up well with multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love that they do not inflate because every kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's 10th b-day party last month. Major hit! Kids and adults had a blast. Dads pelted kids in the face with full-on force (nice, Dads), and I couldn't believe there weren't any tears! Love that they do not inflate because every kind of rubber ball at our house gets a hole within a month. I think these should last a while :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Steinberger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good no injury ball.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent dodge balls . However they are light and my kids wanted throw it further but without the weight it won’t fly far . I get the no injury part but would be nice to fly further .
customer_reviews.author: tank

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these dodge balls for my team. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these dodge balls for my team. It was challenging to motivate them to complete their cardiovascular work after practice. These dodge balls changed everything. They are durable and soft enough to not hurt anyone. 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: JP44

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great and inexpensive. We purchased these to play dodgeball with children at an orphanage. Even the little kids can hold and throw them. Also, when thrown by a big kid with a good arm they do not hurt. Great deal. My grandkids like playing with them, too. We haven't broken anything in the house yet.
customer_reviews.author: DSG

customer_reviews.title: 3" Rainbow Dodgeballs and I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6.3" Rainbow Dodgeballs and I am very happy with them. I like the 6.3" size because I remember at school the dodgeballs would be too big or too small, but this size fits/grips very nicely.The coating on the dodgeballs seem like they will last a long time, plus they are still soft. The bag that comes with it is also handy too. I am very satisfied with this product and it comes at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wong

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: Just got the dodgeballs and I am really happy with the quality. Coating feels strong and durable. Quality seems to be on par with other dodgeball brands like Voit, gopher, gator skin, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dodgeballs at an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: We really love these dodge balls. The quality is great, and a fraction of the cost of the high-end ones. We were heisitant to purchase them considering they were much affordable than some other brands, but when we got them, we couldn't have been happier. We use them at school and they're not too hard to hurt the skin, but firm enough to get distance when you throw them. Very satisfied with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set! It's nice to have a set for the kids that make sense! I've seen them use basketballs, soccerballs and even a softball once as they cobbled together enough balls to play a good game. Great quality. My son went nuts when he's saw it. I'd get it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Soft and perfect size for throwing. My son hides them in his room so he doesn't have to share them.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Easy to throw and don't hurt.
customer_reviews.text: These throw very well and work great. I use them with elementary kids and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to throw at my kids. Leaves no marks
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: softer but less grippier than the competition
customer_reviews.text: I have both comparative brands and this one is softer but less grippy than the competition. not bad for the price but the competitive brand is more functional since it has better grip, especially for kids.
customer_reviews.author: tufcritic

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I bought these and the rhino skin dodge balls for my physical education classes about 6 months ago. We use these on a regular basis. My students and I agree that these are a better ball. They stay harder, but don't hurt and the rhino skins have some rips in the skin and these still look brand new! Great ball!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynnsmom

customer_reviews.title: the kids have loved playing with them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 4th grade classroom and for the last few months, the kids have loved playing with them. We use them for dodge ball and capture the flag. I would say they're just the right size because little kids can get a hold of them and they don't hurt if you get hit. Bigger and more athletic kids are able to launch them pretty fast. I"m sure these balls will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of coated foam balls
customer_reviews.text: Great set of coated foam balls. The pre-kindergarten students are not even afraid of getting hit, although I don't let them throw at each other! Bright colors and a good size for little hands to throw and catch.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia S.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller dodge balls.
customer_reviews.text: Balls are fine. They were smaller than I had hoped for, I should have paid more attention. Found the Mikasa Official Rubber 8.5 which I was happier with. I use these ones with smaller kids as they are smaller and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce A. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Great set to play dodgeball with
customer_reviews.text: Great set to play dodgeball with. The balls are manageable enough for even small hands (our age group was b/w Kindergarten and 6th for kids, plus all of the adults of course!). They have enough weight for a good, strong throw, but enough cushion so that there were no injuries and/or tears.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: These are great! My kids have been playing with them since ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My kids have been playing with them since Christmas (roughly at times) and they’ve held up well! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be very good quality and soft enough they don't leave a welt
customer_reviews.text: Have only used them a few times. We will be using them next month in some serious dodgeball games, so let's hope they last through the season and then some! Seem to be very good quality and soft enough they don't leave a welt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are some great dodgeballs AND the have a carrying bag too
customer_reviews.text: These are some great dodgeballs AND the have a carrying bag too! Great price and they threw very well for all of the adults using them.
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: Fun set of balls!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for the money. Great for dodge ball or fun on a trampoline. Don’t leave in sun or our for a dog!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Hanna

customer_reviews.title: They are indoor or outdoor suitable as they are durable and clean off easily, the strong simple mesh bag makes transporting them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bags of these dodge balls for my school K - 7, they fit into the hands of the youngest and don't hurt when thrown by the eldest! They are indoor or outdoor suitable as they are durable and clean off easily, the strong simple mesh bag makes transporting them back and forth a breeze. The bright colours of the balls have not faded. I am looking forward to watching the students play with these balls for many years. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Just like the ones they use at school!"
customer_reviews.text: My son is having "ball-a-palooza" birthday party -- all of his favorite ball games including dodge ball. Each boy is getting a dodge ball as a party favor. When the package arrived, my son was thrilled because they are just like the ones they use at school. He was particular about the quality, size , etc. and he is very happy. Haven't had the party yet, but I know his buddies will have fun with these high-quality balls.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Roosterpoor

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are dense enough to make them easy to throw, yet light enough to not hurt. The durable coating has held up well. I use them twice a week with my high school P.E. class. I bought these because they were cheaper than the set of Rhino Dodgeballs that we have used in the past. These are of the same quality. The texture is a slightly different, but they have proven to be just as durable. My students love them. I would absolutely buy this product again! They are every bit as good as Rhino, but cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further and buy now.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Soft to the initial and soft upon impact. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anthony kilburg

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Great dodgeball set. Just like the ones I remember from childhood dodgeball in the gym. Was a hit at the family dodgeball game. Both adults and young kids could play because the size of the balls are easy to catch and throw for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these balls. Originally purchased for a trampoline but never bought the trampoline but they enjoy throwing them at eachother! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Great dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. Unless the kids pick at them, they last for years - even with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hamernick

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: These goofy balls really are fun. I have 2 seven year olds and 2 fifteen year olds...they can play together and no one ends up crying!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenagers who love dodgeball.
customer_reviews.text: My teenagets love dodge ball. So far these are holding up well. They get used all the time. They don't sting like some dodge balls.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: They're the perfect size, weight
customer_reviews.text: We use these dodgeballs to play in an adult social league. They're the perfect size, weight, and texture. We did experience a premature tear with one of the balls, but GoSports was quick to resolve the issue. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls!
customer_reviews.text: Great balls. Could have a bit more weight to them but seem built to last a while
customer_reviews.author: Reepeat

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Zumba Kids class
customer_reviews.text: I bought these balls to use in a Zumba Kids class that I teach. I wanted a ball that was tough enough to use in the exercises and games yet would not sting if the kids were hit. The balls were great and the kids loved them. Even the younger ones could easily hold onto them and use them for the activities. The net bag that came with the set of six balls made them easy to transport to and from the class location.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Head Shots don't hurt!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! I just got hit in the head last night playing with teens. Didn't hurt a bit! :)
customer_reviews.author: Theallentodd

customer_reviews.title: Really great set of Dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: Really great set of Dodgeballs. I bought two of these items and am looking forward to playing some games with them with teenagers. Both the balls and the mesh bag seem like they are high quality and we'll see how they shape up in time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kerkhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 7 and 10 yr old boys.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 7 and 10 year old boys. They were very excited for them. They are good handful size for both of them but are soft enough that I don't listen to crying when they didn't quite dodge the ball. These were the only balls that I could find that didn't require air to be filled. they won't ever go flat and the coating seems to take quite a beating without falling apart. They are as colorful as the picture posted on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Pup

customer_reviews.title: very fun and safe ball
customer_reviews.text: very fun and safe ball, I used with 4 years childrens and adults I will buy another set...good for exercise in fun way..,the price in the beginning I think that was high but now I think that is ok. for the quality and safe fun game
customer_reviews.author: BENNY BARBOSA

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great! had 40 high school teens including football players ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great! had 40 high school teens including football players throwing. Balls did great. no rips or tears. Nice they don't have to be inflated, seems to be foam inside but they can travel real fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Boncha

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Using them for dodge balls primarily indoors. So far they have been great but only time will tell. They have a small vent air hole and the coating is raised slightly at the openings. So far it hasn't been an issue but the air/vent hole appears to be where the coating will break first. Will update if the are issues or increase rating if there are no issues
customer_reviews.author: jt27

customer_reviews.title: I would give them a 0 if I could. ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give them a 0 if I could. We bought these balls for our students for a newly constructed playground. The first day one had a hole. They have only been playing with them for a couple of weeks and many are tearing and have holes. Would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: teacheroftruth

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it and they are pretty durable for this tough ...
customer_reviews.text: Using weekly in High School class. The kids love it and they are pretty durable for this tough crew.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Bee

customer_reviews.title: and they're still in great condition. I can't wait until summer to really ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been 3 months since I've had these balls, and they're still in great condition. I can't wait until summer to really put them to the test by playing dodge ball with my children.
customer_reviews.author: Zola

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this dodgeball set for a group of boys ages 12-17 to have a dodgeball tournament. The dodgeballs worked out really well. How great to find a ball that is fun to use, but won't send anyone to the ER. We are looking forward to hosting a Thanksgiving dodgeball game on Thanksgiving morning. We are excited, because kids of all ages will be able to play without threat of being hurt. The one complaint my son had was that maybe they were too lite, but to me that was the purpose behind the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kar Linford

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but great quality balls. Our students love using them for dodgeball.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have three boys aged 10 and under who received these as a Christmas present. They are just like the ones they use in P.E. at school. Great quality. They have been used inside and outside (always stored inside though) and have stood up to the wear and tear so far!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous:)

customer_reviews.title: U will get a ton of use. Use indoors ...
customer_reviews.text: U will get a ton of use. Use indoors only for longevity. We play on a basketball court. Outdoor dodgeball should be played with rubberized playground balls.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMike

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, despite price
customer_reviews.text: These were the cheapest I found with good quality. Balls came packaged well, expected 6 balls and received 6. The rhino skin outer layer is tough, I've had over 10 dodgeball games with 30 kids handling them, sometimes kicking them and no tears. Love the color variation, gets the kids excited to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing set of dodgeballs! They are very bright, colorful and very soft as well. I bought these for our youth group at church and all of the kids seem to love them. They are lightweight and easy to throw. The carry bag that comes with the set is very helpful and makes carrying around the balls very easy. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily U.

customer_reviews.title: They love playing dodgeball and these balls are just the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I run my school's elementary age before and after care program and bought these balls for them. They love playing dodgeball and these balls are just the right size for their hands. They are soft so no one is ever hurt. The kids love the bright colors. We use them every day during the long indoor months of winter and they hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Middle school students
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the 6 inch might be too small, but we held a dodge ball tournament last night here at church, and the Middle school students loved the size.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: This is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: These dodgeballs are great! We've used the inflatable type in the past, but this is the way to go. Easy to grip, nice to throw and no adding air.
customer_reviews.author: printerpete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our little, wild, family!
customer_reviews.text: We just received these dodgeballs this week and are so excited to have them! They're very lightweight but seemed extremely durable as well. We are planning on using them on the trampoline and in the basketball court at the park. We have three boys ages 6, 9, and 11 and we're always looking for fun family things to do that don't cause too many tears and don't include TV screens or video games.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them. Compared to their competitors these are dodge ...
customer_reviews.text: These are essential pieces of equipment for any active program. I run before and after-school programs and we use these on a daily basis. I highly recommend them. Compared to their competitors these are dodge balls are just as good for a lower price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: These are great! They are the same quality as the rhino ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous when ordering these to use as dodgeballs. I am used to the "Rhino Skin" balls. I am the director of a before and after school program, so they get a ton of use by many different little hands. These are great! They are the same quality as the rhino skin balls, but a little cheaper. If you're looking to save some cash, this is a great way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe for the students and still fun.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Safe for the students and still fun.
customer_reviews.author: cae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the balls! just the right size and do not sting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A quality product.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these GoSports dodgeballs is on par with the Rhinoskin brand balls I usually use. These balls are made with a higher density foam which gives them moderate bounce, so they are useful for a variety of PE activities. These balls are priced lower than other quality dodgeballs and they come with a mesh carrying bag, so they represent an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Clymer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, no sting dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Great for dodge ball for kids twelve and under.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for children's church. Does not hurt when being hit. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Received quickly and they look like a great quality
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and they look like a great quality. The 6 inch size is good for young kid dodge ball.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the balls are exactly as described. They are a good size to hold with an average size hand and will be great balls for our upcoming dodgeball tournament. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: these are used by adult men & women to play a fun game of dodge ball
customer_reviews.text: To relieve stress and as a team builder, these are used by adult men & women to play a fun game of dodge ball.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: I have used other brands but these are just as good if not better because they were much cheaper than ...
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered 6 of these and they are outstanding! I have used other brands but these are just as good if not better because they were much cheaper than the others ones I ordered in the past. You can use these on the ice for ice hockey practice, out on the driveway for dodge ball or on a field.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball.  Low price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ball. Price was also the lowest I could find for this type of dodgeball. You can throw them as hard as you want and they still don't hurt. Perfect size for my kids hands. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: Great Dodgeballs...!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. We used them for our kids summer camp games... The Kids Love them!
customer_reviews.author: John Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: My boys love these dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these dodge balls! They say they're as good as the balls they use at home school gym at the YMCA. We had bought some playground balls from Walmart that you can use also as dodge balls, but we had to make a trip to get my sons hand x-rayed, because the balls were too hard for dodge ball. I returned them and bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A.

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic purchase. My boys and their friends have literally ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase. My boys and their friends have literally played with these everyday since we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Alder

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, great for dodgeball and they are pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, great for dodgeball and they are pain free. I have been hit in the face a couple of times now and it didn't hurt
customer_reviews.author: Judge24

customer_reviews.title: Exceed expectations
customer_reviews.text: These balls were exactly what we desired- easy to throw far distances, yet nearly pain-free when hits were made (dodgeball). The colors are bright and kids love them. Rugged "whale skin" seems durable and should hold up for years. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: B. Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Great for school games of dodgball!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and I bought these balls for our class games of dodgeball. The smaller kids found them easy to grip, since they are not a big as a standard dodgeball. They are super soft and no kids were hurt when they got hit.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for children to play
customer_reviews.text: These balls are very soft and made of foam. Great for kids to play with. And it won't hurt the kids. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri Jemeljanov

customer_reviews.title: These balls are great. My kids love to play dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great. My kids love to play dodgeball, and since my son is twice the size of my daughters I am concerned he would hurt them or their friends, but these balls don't hurt, even if they are thrown fast. I am very pleased with these balls, and they clean up nicely in the mesh bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my boys and they LOVE them! They immediately had a neighborhood dodge ball ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boys and they LOVE them! They immediately had a neighborhood dodge ball game and they stood up to the test! Strong skin for rough pre-teens to use and perfect for outdoor play! the carry bag is a nice bonus not offered by other brands! I'm sure they'll be begging for another set soon to help expand their arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Endless hours of fun with our kids. Can't get enough dodgeball with this great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for older teen boys, but soft enough for co-ed play.
customer_reviews.text: These are tough enough for teens, but soft enough for co-ed play.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 18 of these balls for use with a young men's organization. I'm quite pleased with them. Appear to be well made, the boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: These things are great!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! My son is six and has no problem handling them and loves the game dodge ball! They are durable but soft enough so when the kids take a good hit, there ok! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: A little slick
customer_reviews.text: A little slick to hang on to but they got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Long

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: My brother came to town to visit and brought these with him! Our families had such a blast that I got online to order some for us! They are the perfect size for kids or adults. You can throw them hard but they don't hurt when they hit. Way fun!
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving these dodgeballs I can already tell that they will be long lasting and are high quality . I am very excited to start using them for various activities in my middle school PE classes.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I was nervous they would be too light ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I was nervous they would be too light for a legit dodgeball game (I grew up with the rubber, inflated doge balls). But there are just as good. They fly well and and still pack a good “hit” on your opponent without leaving an actual injury.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Palmer

product_meta.title: GoSports Soft Touch Foam Dodgeball Set for Kids & Adults | 6 Pack with Mesh Carry Bag| Choose 6" or 7" Size
product_meta.description: Here's why kids and adults love the sting free surface! The GoSports Elephant Skin Dodgeball (not real elephant skin) uses incredible play and safety technology to remove the "sting" you typically get with a regular dodgeball and let's everyone join on the fun. Virtually every problem is solved with this set when it comes to dodgeball: the durable material holds up, the smaller size is perfect so kids can play too, and the softness of this set means no one gets hurt! Thanks to the incredibly durable rubber ("elephant skin") exterior these dodgeballs also hold up against extended use by kids and adults both indoors and outdoors meaning you get the best bang for your buck. That's what makes the GoSports Elephant Skin Dodgeball set so popular among schools, camps, parents, and just about everyone! Plus this set includes a bonus mesh carrying bag for easy storage.
feature_bullets: DODGEBALL SET: 6 colorful foam dodgeballs for backyard play, summer camp activities, school pe gym equipment and more
NO-STING SURFACE: Unlike typical rubber balls, the surface of these balls does not sting on impact - great for all ages
LATEX-FREE: Made from durable tear resistant material that holds up against extended use both indoors and outdoors
STORAGE BAG INCLUDED: Heavy duty mesh carry bag for easy portability and neat storage
